text:
AI is coming for the jobs you thought were safe.

Especially these 5 truths on law & medicine:

1. AI Reads Faster Than Any Lawyer
↳ AI can scan, analyze, and summarize thousands of legal documents in seconds.  
↳ No human can match this speed or accuracy.

2. Medical Diagnosis Is Now Data-Driven  
↳ AI systems already outperform doctors in spotting diseases on scans and lab results.  
↳ Early detection and fewer errors are now possible with machine learning.

3. AI Never Sleeps  
↳ AI works 24/7, never gets tired, never needs a break.  
↳ This means faster results for clients and patients.

4. Routine Tasks Are Disappearing  
↳ Repetitive work like filling forms, reviewing contracts, or checking symptoms is now automated.  
↳ Only the most complex cases need a human touch.

5. AI Is A Better Human Than Humans
↳ In a study, doctors rated ChatGPT’s answers 10× more empathetic than physicians’ replies.
 ↳ In a clinical trial, people chatting with the Woebot CBT app saw significant drops in depression scores in just 2 weeks.

Ignore these truths at your own risk.

The world is changing fast.
